sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Brightroar was the ancestral Valyrian steel greatsword of House Lannister. House Lannister has been searching for a replacement ever since it was lost. Tywin Lannister tried numerous times to buy one from impoverished noble houses but was always rebuffed, lords preferring to offer their daughters in marriage rather than part from such valuable heirlooms. Meanwhile, Tywin's youngest brother, Gerion Lannister, went into an expedition to the [[Valyrian Peninsula]] approximately in 291 AC, with the goal of finding Brightroar, and, like King Tommen II, never returned.
